long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a minimalistic interface to automatically setup any HTML5 <video> playback rate, even where the interface doesn't offer such option.

The goal is to be able to consume any video content either faster, or slower, than usual, through a simplified, accessible, interface that can be disabled with the change of a single checkbox.
